channel.title: SQL warninngs while submitting a server on status page?
channel.description:
ok i get 3 MYSQL warnings when i submit my server up on the servr status page.
MITB wont reply to my help, so please guys whats going on?
[URL=http://img841.imageshack.us/i/69530068.png/][IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/1309/69530068.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: SQL warninngs while submitting a server on status page?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:361856”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=363862.msg3348322#msg3348322 date=1285018459]

My server won’t approve.

When I register it I get this MYSQL error

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

[size=18pt]
It’s not an error, it’s a warning, as it says.[/size]
[/quote]

But I have went ahead and told PHP to hide warnings, just so people stop bugging me. :)[/quote]

^ I knew it! because usally my server gets onto the page within a few hours but i keep trying because even after days it still doesnt get accpeted. Also I post it freshly if it doesnt get accpeted ever 24 hours but still nothing…Maybe you should just let everyone by pass the further action page?

Read full topic
item.source: SQL warninngs while submitting a server on status page?

item.title: SQL warninngs while submitting a server on status page?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1252, topic:275446”][quote author=Lethal234 link=topic=363862.msg3348310#msg3348310 date=1285018004]
My server won’t approve.

When I register it I get this MYSQL error

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
[/quote]
[size=18pt]
It’s not an error, it’s a warning, as it says.[/size][/quote]

But I have went ahead and told PHP to hide warnings, just so people stop bugging me.

Read full topic
